body.name: Storkcraft Premium Hoop Glider and Ottoman (Natural/Beige) – Padded Cushions with Storage Pocket, Smooth Rocking Motion, Easy to Assemble, Solid Hardwood Base
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 20 hrs 37 mins
features: PREMIUM COMFORT: The Storkcraft Hoop Glider and Ottoman offers you generous seating room, comfortable padded arm cushions with convenient storage pockets, and enclosed metal ball bearings for a smooth gliding motion to gently rock you and your little one to relaxation
CONVENIENT STORAGE: Each padded arm cushion includes a convenient storage pocket to hold any reading materials or essentials you need to keep within arm’s reach
MULTIPLE COLORS: Designed to match any nursery, this glider is available in multiple cushion and base colors so it will match your style and blend seamlessly with the rest of your nursery furniture

SIZE: Maximum recommended weight (250 pounds); Length (29 inches); Height (40 inches); Width (27.5 inches); Seat width (18 inches); Seat depth (18 inches); Seat height (17.5 inches); Ottoman length (16 inches); Ottoman height (14.5 inches); Ottoman width (20 inches)
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: This product requires assembly; base of glider made of solid hardwood material
body.description: Bring your dream nursery to life with the comfortable, timeless, family-favorite Storkcraft Hoop Glider and Ottoman. The Storkcraft Hoop Glider and Ottoman is a stylish 2-piece nursery glider and ottoman set that combines value, comfort, and quality craftsmanship. The Storkcraft Hoop Glider and Ottoman’s padded arm cushions are equipped with a convenient storage pocket, allowing parents to store their favorite reading materials and small nursery essentials. For a smooth, relaxing, and gentle rocking experience within the nursery, the glider and ottoman feature enclosed metal ball bearings. The glider and ottoman’s solid wood base provides families with long-lasting durability. The Storkcraft Hoop Glider and Ottoman is crafted of rubberwood framing, engineered wood, and wood composites, and its applied finish has been tested to meet or exceed the applicable ASTM and CPSIA safety standards. Storkcraft is the proud recipient of the Parent Tested Parent Approved (PTPA) Seal of Approval for nursery and children’s bedroom furniture, and the 2022 Women's Choice Award for 9 out of 10 Recommended Baby & Kids Furniture. Backed by a 1-year limited manufacturer’s warranty. Assembly required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Probably the most comfortable chair I own
reviews.reviewText: We bought this chair for my sons nursery, and it’s quality is so good. I spent so long looking for a budget friendly rocking chair. And this one fits that. It’s comfortable, budget friendly, easy to build, and feels like you spend $500 on it.I’ve had it for a few months. And the photo depicts what it’s expected to look like.As a new mom, I knew I wouldn’t have the rocking chair for too long so I didn’t want to spend too much on something I wouldn’t be keeping for too long. So this fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort and Functionality for Parents and Babies
reviews.reviewText: The Storkcraft Premium Hoop Glider and Ottoman have been a wonderful addition to our nursery. The comfort level is exceptional, with plush cushioning that is perfect for those long nights rocking the baby to sleep. The gliding motion is smooth and soothing, both for me and my little one.The build quality is impressive - it's sturdy and well-constructed, giving me confidence that it will last through the baby and toddler years. The armrests are at a comfortable height, and the side pockets are a thoughtful touch for storing essentials like burp cloths, books, or a phone.The ottoman is a great addition, providing additional comfort for my legs, especially during longer feeding sessions. It also glides in sync with the chair, enhancing the overall relaxing experience.The aesthetics of the glider are also noteworthy. It fits beautifully in our nursery decor, and the fabric is easy to clean, which is essential with little ones.Overall, the Storkcraft Premium Hoop Glider and Ottoman offer a perfect blend of comfort, functionality, and style. It's a must-have for any new parent looking for a cozy, reliable rocking chair for their nursery. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: I used this chair as part of my plan to surprise my husband that we were expecting so I had to set this up myself at a few weeks pregnant. I'm under 5 feet tall and less than 150lbs, so it did not take me much power to put this together before he got home.I received this rocking chair quickly, The box was heavy-ish but I was able to slide it into the house and take everything out of the box and bring it upstairs without hassle. It took me about 30 minutes to set up because you only really put together the back of the chair and the two arm rests. The one bolt/screw combo for the armrests were a little difficult doing it by myself but I was able to figure it out and that was literally the most difficult part. Everything else connected smoothly. The foot rest was slightly uneven making it knock on our floor when rocked. I will place something under the one corner to even it out. Right now I am using a piece of cardboard that came with the box and it is working just fine.The last annoyance was the snaps for the armrest cushions had a very hard time snapping because the material had no give. It took me a few tries to pull it taught enough that it would stay. Again, there were annoyances and not something that would have stopped me from buying this or make me want to return it. Hopefully, they do not unsnap while rocking because that will be a little more than annoying.It feels very sturdy to me. The wood felt solid and the chair did not make me feel like I was going to fall through. We will have my husband try who is a good 260lbs but honestly, I think he would think I paid more for it than I did.It feels comfortable, I am not sure if the cushions will flatten but sitting in it for a few minutes made me want to fall asleep.All in all I would say buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great chair, great price!
reviews.reviewText: This chair was simple enough to assemble on my own at 9 months pregnant. The only issue I ran into was the spot where the buttons should screw into the arm rests. The holes were not properly drilled, it was just a tiny little indent that indicated where they should go. Hubby had to really force the screws into the wood for me. Other than that this chair had been really enjoyable and very comfortable for me and the little one. Haven’t experienced any damage or squeaking as some others have reported. It shipped nicely. We are happy with it and would recommend to others as it is a nice chair and priced very fairly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought the chair as we were expecting a newborn. Great chair for the price. Some others said there wasn’t enough cushion but the cushion seems good for us. Also assembly was easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price point for this chair
reviews.reviewText: We really enjoy the rocking chair. Slightly flimsy but it’s great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice , comfy and easy to assemble! Very sturdy too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's alright, ups n downs.
reviews.reviewText: I've seen quite a few of the other reviews, saying the back rest and arms don't line up properly, which is very true. I ended up just loosening up all the bolts, lined it all up, sinched em back down, no big deal! However, this is still an issue that should be attended to. Mine also arrived with a broken strut on the bottom of the chair, again not a huge deal and more than likely not the companies fault, but rather the shipping company. The snaps are eh, I had to work to keep them snapped, but some super glue otta keep em down. The back rest cushion is pretty nice, the seat cushion is eh, the arms are alright. The ottoman is quite nice! Overall, this thing is super easy to put together with a little trickery, it has some misalignments, but a solid 6.5/10 for a $160 chair.
Lo compre pars la llegada de mi bebe, aun no lo uso mucho pero esta muy comodo!

This is super easy to put together. I’m 7.5 months pregnant and did it myself. Matches our nursery perfectly. Was hesitant to order as reviews say it is uncomfy/not soft. I love it! Super comfy to both me and my partner. Only thing is, I paid $284 before taxes, and now it’s listed for $419+ tax. Not sure it is worth that as you can get a quite nice chair for that price. Sizing is perfect for our small nursery.
Esta muy cómoda, nos encantó a mi bebé y a mi. No es tan complicada armarla y vale mucho la pena. El banquito viene ya armado, solo la silla debe armarse
Muy buen producto hasta ahora después de 3 meses todo bien, solo hubo un detalle con los botones de los descansa brazos, no se pueden abrochar. Tienen el mismo tipo y no pueden cerrarse.
Es súper cómodo, lo compré para dormir a mi bebe y cuando no estoy en la casa lo extraño. Nada mas le agregue una almohada como soporte lumbar. Pero para ver la tele también está muy a gusto.
